word: AMONG THE FIRST WHO TAUGHT THE THIRD MESSAGE AND THE OPEN DOOR, WAS THE AUTHOR OF THIS BOOK. BY HER UNTIRING ZEAL, HER EARNEST APPEALS, AND THE CLEAR LIGHT OF THE TESTIMONY WHICH SHE BORE, SHE DID MUCH TO ADVANCE THE CAUSE, TO CORRECT THE ERRORS OF FANATICISM, TO RENEW THE HOPES OF THE DESPONDING, AND TO CHEER THE HEARTS OF THE "LITTLE FLOCK" WHO LOVED THE APPEARING OF THEIR SOON-COMING SAVIOUR.
